subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Justin Leonard won the Texas Open for the third time yesterday, beating Jesper Parnevik with a 10-foot birdie putt on the third hole of a playoff at LaCantera Golf Club Resort Course in San Antonio.Leonard closed with a five-under-par 65 to match Parnevik at 19-under 261. Parnevik, who opened with a 61 and led after each of the first three rounds, finished with a 69.The finish recalled the 1997 British Open, when Parnevik began the final round at Troon five shots ahead of Leonard. But Parnevik shot a 71, and Leonard had a 65 to win.
